name: Emma Bella
description: Excellent doctor!!!Very thorough and caring. I'm terribly afraid of the dentist and he's very sensitive to that and goes the extra mile to make you feel comfortable. Love him!

name: Jackson Oslo
description: Very pleasant indeed! Dr. Nasir Uddin is a great doctor who listens to the patient and takes care of him/her with great attention..

name: Walter Ego
description: Dear Dr Nasir Uddin, thank you for the amazing work you have done on my teeth. I'm so happy to have found such great dentist
